title: Me Myself and Lucifer - 2008-05-20 Business as Usual for an Illu
description:
Me, Myself and Lucifer - Business as Usual for an Illuminati Grandmaster - Part I
------------------------------------------

In this improvised interview you&#039;ll hear a more lighthearted and upbeat side of Leo 

Lyon Zagami, the illustrious new Grandmaster of the Ordo Illuminatorum Universalis - 

one of the most important Illuminati bodies in the world. The thing with Leo is that 

he has a very robust and at times dark and in-your-face sense of humour that can be 

quite refreshing and even informative if you are able to recognize it as such.

We discuss also some rather serious and pressing matters, such as the recent 

Earthquake in China and the recent threatening statements he made against the 

Norwegian Government that seemingly illegally threaten to arrest Leo once he sets 

foot on Norwegian soil again. You have to remember that Leo has a toddler son, Isac 

Rumi, with his now (soon to be) ex-wife, that he is absolutely adamant in being able 

to see but is being prevented by Norwegian authorities from doing so. He holds the 

Norwegian prime minister Jens Stoltenberg directly responsible and is cause for Leo 

to get very angry with him. 

We talk about magic and Of course ole Lucifer and what Leo&#039;s very special connection 

is to this rather well-known but mysterious principality demon. We talk about Bush 

sr. and how senile he seems to be getting. 

And of course we address Leo&#039;s rather poor reception on ConCen lately, and we didn&#039;t 

even leave out Leo&#039;s past in psychiatric institutions.

And a lot more folks, so please enjoy and try to lighten up a little when listening 

okay? (well that is, except perhaps for the Earthquake in China part) 

Your host for the day: Phil/ephilution/grinreaper
